com.facebook.infrastructure.dht
Class Range

  com.facebook.infrastructure.dht.Range
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Range>
public class Range
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Range>

A representation of the range that a node is responsible for on the DHT ring. Author : Avinash Lakshman ( alakshman@facebook.com) & Prashant Malik ( pmalik@facebook.com )
